department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography:
David graduated from DePaul University with a B.S. in Game Programming. While at DePaul he cofounded The Amiable and started working on their first commercial title, Tetrapulse. He has experience working with multiple studios such as Flippfly and Robomodo on titles for mobile, desktop, and console platforms. 

David is also heavily involved in the Chicago developer community where he helps organize various local events.
